Name: Master vs Slave
About the game: Master vs Slave is a RPG where you get to role-play as a master or as a slave. As a slave, you can choose to be a loyal submissive that lives to please the master, or a defiant rebel that plots revenge and escape. Depending on your choices, the game will have different endings. As a master, you play a more singular route of training your slaves and making money to run your business. It has no ending and is a sandbox-type gameplay.
Meta Title: Master vs Slave: Jun 25, 2020, Noxurtica and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Master vs Slave? Check out the release date (Jun 25, 2020), developer insights from Noxurtica, and a complete game summary.
